topic.title: Zeronet and Archive.is or archive.org type archive
topic.body:
Hello,
I am looking for developers to help with an Archive style website like archive.is or archive.org

it needs functionality similar to the same backup of websites and to be functional so it is not centralized.

i will send bitcoin for limited billing hours and this will help development of ZeroNet and the address system as well.

Thanks!

1604064842_mirrored_kyonetca_github.body:
i have looked at this and am going to try it on some hosting to see if it is functional, it will be useful in decentralization of Web archiving.

https://github.com/internetarchive/heritrix3

or this might also be another option that would be interesting to run if possible.... even if it is converged with ZeroNET

Archivematica: open-source digital preservation system
https://www.archivematica.org/
